name: Headshot Heroes
description:
Tap, tap, tap, HEADSHOT!

Game Features:

SUPER SIMPLE!
Headshot Heroes couldn’t be easier to play. Just one tap does everything!

HILARIOUS
Tons of crazy teams to play as including monsters, sushi chefs, cats and more!

LIFE'S BETTER WITH FRIENDS
The more of your friends play Headshot Heroes, the more REWARDS you receive! Get your friends involved!

COLLECT THE HEADS!
Every time you blast a goalkeeper’s head off it’s added to your collection. The more you have the more bonuses and achievements you unlock!

SUPER STYLISH
Headshot Heroes looks timeless with its stylized 8bit graphics look!

Important Consumer Information. This app: Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third party ad serving and analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. Allows players to communicate via Facebook notifications. To disable see the settings in-game. The app uses Game Center. Log out of Game Center before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.

User Agreement : http://terms.ea.com/en
Privacy & Cookie Policy : http://privacy.ea.com/en
Visit http://www.chillingo.com/about/game-faqs/ for assistance or inquiries.


EA may retire online features and services after 30 days notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates
